Edges-Bard -- Male Human Heroic Bard
Attributes (12 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d12 Strength: d6 Vigor: d12
Skills (14 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Survival: (sma) d4
Athletics: (agi) d4 Performance: (spi) d10 Thievery: (agi) d4
Boating: (agi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d6 Weird Science: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6 Research: (sma) d4
Healing: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d6
Skill Notes:
Humiliate: May reroll Taunt
Jingoistic: -2 Persuasion (characters from other cultures)
Provoke: Raise on Taunt inflicts -2 on foe attacks on other targets; joker Action Card ends
Retort: Raise on resisting Intimidation or Taunt Test causes foe to be Distracted
Sharp Tongued: May use Performance in place of Taunt and may repeat using different words
Size: -1
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 14; Edge: 12; Skill: 2
Description Notes: Small: -1 Size
Features
Edges (7 points): Arcane Background (Bard); Dirge; Humiliate; Inspire Heroics; Instrument; Provoke; Retort Hindrances: Jingoistic; Pacifist; Slow; Small Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Bard): Has Armor Interference and Sharp Tongued features
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 8 (1) Pace/Run: 5/+d4
Armor: Tunic Shield: None Weapons: Blowgun (d4-2 R3"); Hand Crossbow (2d4 R5"); Sap (d6+d4); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Slow: -1 Pace/-1 Run Step
Small: -1 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Inspire Heroics: R8" May spend a Benny 1/encounter to grant allies 5 Trait or damage rerolls
Jingoistic: Command edges do not effect allies from other cultures
Pacifist: Will harm others only when no other option is available
Arcana
Power Count: 3 Power Points: 10
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Bard): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Armor Interference: In medium or heavy armor, suffers -4 arcane skill rolls and cannot use arcane edge features
Dirge: R10" Target suffers -2 on Benny roll
Instrument: +1 Performance to cast spell
